tool_description: Converts resume documents from various formats (PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, RTF) into standardized text format for further processing.

file_path.description: Path to the resume document file

source_format.description: Original file format (pdf, doc, docx, txt, rtf)

preserve_formatting.description: Whether to preserve basic formatting like line breaks and spacing

error_messages: Unsupported file format: Use one of [pdf, doc, docx, txt, rtf]. Ensure the file extension matches the declared source_format.
File not accessible: Check that the file_path exists and is readable. Verify file permissions.
Corrupted document: The file appears damaged or encrypted. Try with an uncorrupted version.
Empty document: The document contains no extractable text content.
usage: Provide the file_path and source_format of the resume document. Optionally set preserve_formatting to maintain document structure. The tool outputs clean, standardized text ready for parsing.

converted_text.description: The document content converted to plain text format

page_count.description: Number of pages in the original document

conversion_status.description: Status of conversion process (success, partial, failed)
